fca_relevance.claim_type: Presenting false or fraudulent claims in violation of 31 U.S.C. §3729(a)(1)(A) -- provider excluded from Federal healthcare programs under 42 U.S.C. §1320a-7b is prohibited from billing Medicaid and all claims submitted post-exclusion constitute per se false claims under the FCA
